metadata.how_to_trigger: Start Act 2 epilogue with Florrick being present and speak with the Flaming Fist.Debug Book -> Set quest flags -> Act 2 -> SCE - Epilogue -> Set up good path -> End debrief dialog -> Speak with S_SCE_PatrollingFlamingFist_001

0.speaker: Flaming Fist
0.text: We need to move. The city's in danger.

1.speaker: Flaming Fist
1.text: We need to get back to the city before those monsters do. Baldur's Gate is my home - I have to protect it.
